welcome_message_body: Welcome to Allen, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities! Known for its friendly community, beautiful parks, and diverse dining options, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: New Ocean View Bar
restaurants.description: New Ocean View Bar is a seafood restaurant located in the city.
restaurants.address: Kinabranan-1, Allen, Northern Samar, Eastern Visayas

restaurants.name: Kuya Khim Savory House
restaurants.description: Kuya Khim Savory House is a filipino restaurant located in Allen.

restaurants.name: Maria's Kitchen
restaurants.description: Maria's Kitchen is a bistro located in Allen.

restaurants.name: Ram's Grill House
restaurants.description: Ram's Grill House is a filipino restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport handles all domestic flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Southwest Terminal
terminals.description: The Southwest Terminal at Love Field Airport is dedicated to Southwest Airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The first terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals at DFW, with a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, with direct flights to destinations around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal with a focus on regional flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, exclusively serving American Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.
